name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (PMAY)
description: Affordable housing scheme for EWS/LIG families with subsidy up to ₹2.67L on home loan interest.
eligibility: EWS/LIG families with annual income up to ₹6L (LIG) or ₹3L (EWS).

name: Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana (PMJDY)
description: Financial inclusion scheme providing access to banking, credit, and insurance services.
eligibility: All Indian residents with valid ID, no minimum age limit.

name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
description: Income support scheme for farmers providing ₹6,000 per year.
eligibility: Small and marginal farmers with landholding up to 2 hectares.

name: Pradhan Mantri Jeevan Jyoti Bima Yojana (PMJJBY)
description: Life insurance scheme offering ₹2L coverage at low premium.
eligibility: Individuals aged 18-50 with a bank account.

name: Pradhan Mantri Suraksha Bima Yojana (PMSBY)
description: Accident insurance scheme offering coverage for death or disability.
eligibility: Individuals aged 18-70 with a bank account.

name: Atal Pension Yojana (APY)
description: Pension scheme for unorganized sector workers with guaranteed returns.
eligibility: Individuals aged 18-40 with a bank account.

name: Pradhan Mantri Ujjwala Yojana (PMUY)
description: Free LPG connections for women from BPL households to promote clean cooking.
eligibility: Women from BPL households with valid KYC.

name: Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana (PMMSY)
description: Scheme to promote sustainable development of fisheries sector.
eligibility: Fishers, fish farmers, and related stakeholders.

name: Pradhan Mantri Fasal Bima Yojana (PMFBY)
description: Crop insurance scheme to protect farmers against crop loss.
eligibility: Farmers growing notified crops in notified areas.

name: Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana (PMKVY)
description: Skill development scheme for youth to enhance employability.
eligibility: Unemployed youth, school/college dropouts with valid ID.

name: Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana (PMGSY)
description: Rural road connectivity scheme to improve access in villages.
eligibility: Rural areas with population above 500 (plain areas).

name: National Rural Livelihood Mission (NRLM)
description: Scheme to promote self-employment and livelihoods in rural areas.
eligibility: Rural poor, especially women, forming SHGs.

name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana - Gramin (PMAY-G)
description: Housing scheme for rural poor to provide pucca houses.
eligibility: Homeless families or those living in kutcha houses in rural areas.
category: Financial assistance of ₹1.2L in plains and ₹1.3L in hilly areas.

name: Deen Dayal Antyodaya Yojana (DAY-NRLM)
description: Scheme to reduce poverty through promotion of diversified and gainful self-employment.
eligibility: Rural poor households, especially women.

name: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA)
description: Scheme to provide 100 days of wage employment to rural households.
eligibility: Adult members of rural households willing to do unskilled manual work.

name: National Social Assistance Programme (NSAP)
description: Social assistance scheme for the poor and vulnerable sections.
eligibility: BPL families, elderly, widows, disabled persons.

name: Pradhan Mantri Matru Vandana Yojana (PMMVY)
description: Maternity benefit scheme for pregnant and lactating mothers.
eligibility: Pregnant women and lactating mothers for first live birth.

name: Integrated Child Development Services (ICDS)
description: Scheme to improve health and nutrition of children and mothers.
eligibility: Children 0-6 years, pregnant and lactating mothers, adolescent girls.

name: Mid-Day Meal Scheme (MDM)
description: Scheme to provide free lunch to school children to improve nutrition and attendance.
eligibility: Students of government and aided schools from class 1 to 8.

name: Sarva Shiksha Abhiyan (SSA)
description: Universal elementary education scheme to ensure education for all children.
eligibility: Children aged 6-14 years.

name: Rashtriya Madhyamik Shiksha Abhiyan (RMSA)
description: Scheme to enhance access to secondary education and improve quality.
eligibility: Students in secondary schools (class 9-10).

name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana - Urban (PMAY-U)
description: Urban housing scheme to provide affordable housing to urban poor.
eligibility: Urban poor, EWS/LIG/MIG categories.

name: Atal Mission for Rejuvenation and Urban Transformation (AMRUT)
description: Scheme to improve basic urban infrastructure in cities.
eligibility: Selected cities and towns across India.

name: Smart Cities Mission (SCM)
description: Scheme to develop smart cities with improved infrastructure and services.
eligibility: Selected cities based on competition.

name: Heritage City Development and Augmentation Yojana (HRIDAY)
description: Scheme to preserve and revitalize heritage cities.
eligibility: Selected heritage cities.

name: Pradhan Mantri Krishi Sinchayee Yojana (PMKSY)
description: Scheme to improve irrigation efficiency and water management in agriculture.
eligibility: Farmers across India.

name: Pradhan Mantri Formalisation of Micro food processing Enterprises (PMFME)
description: Scheme to enhance competitiveness of micro food processing enterprises.
eligibility: Micro food processing units, SHGs, FPOs, cooperatives.

name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Urja Suraksha evam Utthaan Mahabhiyan (PM-KUSUM)
description: Scheme to promote solar energy in agriculture sector.
eligibility: Farmers, rural landowners, cooperatives, panchayats.

name: Jal Jeevan Mission (JJM)
description: Scheme to provide tap water connection to every rural household by 2024.
eligibility: Rural households across India.

name: Swachh Bharat Mission (SBM)
description: Cleanliness and sanitation scheme to make India open defecation free.
eligibility: All citizens, especially in rural and urban areas.

name: Ayushman Bharat Yojana (ABY)
description: Health insurance- Health insurance scheme providing coverage up to ₹5L per family per year.
eligibility: Economically weaker sections as per SECC data.
category: coverage for pre and post-hospitalization expenses.

name: National Health Mission (NHM)
description: Scheme to provide accessible, affordable, and quality healthcare to rural and urban populations.
eligibility: All citizens, with focus on vulnerable groups.

name: Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (PMJAY)
description: Component of Ayushman Bharat providing health insurance to poor and vulnerable families.
eligibility: Families identified based on SECC 2011 data.
category: Coverage up to ₹5L per family per year for secondary and tertiary care hospitalization.

name: Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana (PMKVY)
description: Skill development initiative to enable youth to take up industry-relevant skill training.
eligibility: Unemployed youth, school/college dropouts with valid ID.

name: Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Grameen Kaushalya Yojana (DDU-GKY)
description: Skill development program for rural youth to enhance employability.
eligibility: Rural youth aged 15-35 years from poor families.

name: National Apprenticeship Promotion Scheme (NAPS)
description: Scheme to promote apprenticeship training and provide financial incentives to employers and apprentices.
eligibility: Employers and apprentices in designated trades.

name: Pradhan Mantri Yuva Yojana (PMYY)
description: Scheme to provide entrepreneurship education and training to youth.
eligibility: Youth aged 18-35 years interested in entrepreneurship.

name: Pradhan Mantri Mudra Yojana (PMMY)
description: Scheme to provide loans up to ₹10L to non-corporate, non-farm small/micro enterprises.
eligibility: Small businesses, startups, entrepreneurs in need of financial support.
category: Loans under three categories: Shishu (up to ₹50K)

name: Stand-Up India Scheme
description: Scheme to promote entrepreneurship among SC/ST and women by providing bank loans between ₹10L and ₹1Cr.
eligibility: SC/ST and women entrepreneurs for greenfield projects in manufacturing, services, or trading sector.
category: Composite loan including term loan and working capital

name: Prime Minister's Employment Generation Programme (PMEGP)
description: Scheme to generate employment opportunities through establishment of micro enterprises in rural and urban areas.
eligibility: Individuals above 18 years, SHGs, institutions registered under Societies Registration Act, cooperative societies, charitable trusts.

name: A Scheme for Promotion of Innovation, Rural Industries and Entrepreneurship (ASPIRE)
description: Scheme to set up a network of technology centers and incubation centers to accelerate entrepreneurship and promote startups for innovation in agro-industry.
eligibility: Entrepreneurs, startups, and institutions in agro-based industries.

name: PM Surya Ghar: Muft Bijli Yojana
description: Government scheme to provide free electricity to households through solar panels.
eligibility: Indian citizens owning a house with a suitable roof for solar panels and a valid electricity connection.

name: PM Street Vendor's Atma Nirbhar Nidhi (PM SVANidhi)
description: Scheme to provide working capital loans to street vendors.
eligibility: Street vendors in urban areas with valid ID.

name: Atal Bhujal Yojana (Atal Jal)
description: Scheme to improve groundwater management with focus on community participation.
eligibility: Communities in water-stressed areas in seven states.

name: PM Vishwakarma Scheme
description: Scheme to support artisans and craftspeople in improving product quality and market reach.
eligibility: Artisans and craftspeople in traditional trades.

name: Credit Guarantee Scheme for Micro and Small Enterprises (CGMSE)
description: Scheme to provide collateral-free credit to micro and small enterprises.
eligibility: Micro and small enterprises as per MSME Act.
